name: Cookie Space Golf
description:
WASD to pan around. Scroll to zoom (sorry it's slow).
Right click to rotate camera
left click to shoot ball, can only shoot when ball is not moving
R will reset the ball if you get stuck or lost in space
Esc shows the menu and scorboard.

KnownBug:
After you play through 9 hole game, you'll have to hit esc to see the final score after the final level
